component.name: Meerk40t
component.summary: Meerk40t - alternative software for CO2 and LED lasers

description.p: MeerK40t (pronounced MeerKat) is a built-from-the-ground-up MIT licensed open-source laser cutting software.
The primary goals of this software are simple:

ul.li: Provide users with high quality laser control software.
Provide developers with a highly extensible platform to help further their own ideas, and provide novel work to the laser community at large.
Any GRBL device (Atomstack, Creality, Longer, Ortur etc...)
